name: L U M O G R A D E
name_original: L U M O G R A D E
description:
In LUMOGRADE, the aim is simple: keep a ball of light moving for as long as possible, in an arena of ever-spawning obstacles.

The light will chase your cursor, but don't let it reach you or hit any obstacle!

Two game modes are available:
- ARCADE: The more obstacles you face, the more points you receive! Collect orbs to add to your multiplier and power ups to help you survive long enough to set the high score!

- CLASSIC: No orbs, no power ups, just keep moving and survive for as long as possible!

LUMOGRADE is the first game from 33ghosts.

This game is available on a Name Your Own Price model, meaning it's free if you want, but if you enjoy it, please consider coming back here and donating whatever you think is fair. I'd wager you get more fun out of it than a can of soda!
